Text: iMarketing Concentrated Workshop July San FranciscoVince A worldclass iMarketing event in the hotbed of silicon development what better setting than to be surrounded by those who make the Internet happen You are invited to participate in the ultimate workshop for Intelligent Selling Through Web Site Development Presented by Ken Burke CEO of Multimedia Live this oneday tutorial exceeds site processes and needs exploring actionable methodologies for creating and operating your business on the web Save July as the day you embrace change to positively impact your bottom line a better approach to eCommerce and all facets of successful eBusiness We guarantee you will take away these valuable strategies Please reply with history X your interest in your reply and send Increase sales and customer retention Reduce abandoned carts Improve the overall online customer experience Case studies of winners and losers Campaigns and promotions Direct and indirect content Customer support and riskfree enterprise Loyalty and brand development Reporting and analysis Multichannel support Multimedia Live has earned a reputation for innovative excellence and Mr Burke is a soughtafter source of industry insight His refreshing approach is based upon a commitment to smart growth while emphasizing customer service Plan to attend this heavyhitting workshop which will intimately place you with executives and colleagues for collaborative learning Find out more Please X your selections and reply with history Ken Burkes workshop interests me I would like to learn more about iMarketing Please
